Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix webhook missing fileUrl by downloading media before sending

Previously, webhook and media download ran asynchronously in parallel,
causing fileUrl to be missing from webhook payload since download hadn''t
completed yet. Now media is downloaded synchronously before webhook is
sent, ensuring fileUrl is always included for media messages.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix media download using whatsmeow Download for proper decryption

Previously used raw http.Get\(\) to WhatsApp CDN which fails because
WhatsApp media is encrypted. Now uses whatsmeow''s Download\(\) method
which properly handles authentication and decryption of media files
\(images, videos, audio, documents\).

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
